alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 12:45AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Elko County through 115 AM PDT... At 1244 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 41 miles west of Owyhee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
